mapper.select: SELECT NET_TS, ORG_SYS_CODE, COUNT (1) as num FROM ( SELECT tb.NET_TS, RO.ORG_SYS_CODE, RSBT_STATION.GUID FROM ( SELECT * FROM RSBT_ORG WHERE RSBT_ORG.ORG_SYS_CODE = '529' OR RSBT_ORG.ORG_SYS_CODE = '535' OR RSBT_ORG.ORG_SYS_CODE = '536' ) RO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM RSBT_NET WHERE NET_TS IN ( 'LY0101', 'LY0102', 'LY0103', 'LY0104' ) AND NET_START_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT trunc(sysdate,'yyyy') FROM dual) and (SELECT LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(sysdate,'y'),11))FROM dual) ) tb ON tb.ORG_GUID = RO.GUID LEFT JOIN RSBT_STATION ON RO.GUID = RSBT_STATION.NET_GUID WHERE NET_TS IS NOT NULL ) GROUP BY NET_TS, ORG_SYS_CODE GUID,

SELECT NET_TS, ORG_SYS_CODE, COUNT (1) as num FROM ( SELECT tb.NET_TS, RO.ORG_SYS_CODE, RSBT_STATION.GUID FROM ( SELECT * FROM RSBT_ORG WHERE RSBT_ORG.ORG_SYS_CODE = '529' OR RSBT_ORG.ORG_SYS_CODE = '535' OR RSBT_ORG.ORG_SYS_CODE = '536' ) RO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM RSBT_NET WHERE NET_TS IN ( 'LY0101', 'LY0102', 'LY0103', 'LY0104' ) AND NET_START_DATE BETWEEN (select trunc(add_months(sysdate,-12),'year') from dual) and (select trunc(add_months(sysdate,-12),'year') from dual) ) tb ON tb.ORG_GUID = RO.GUID LEFT JOIN RSBT_STATION ON RO.GUID = RSBT_STATION.NET_GUID WHERE NET_TS IS NOT NULL ) GROUP BY NET_TS, ORG_SYS_CODE, GUID
